text: “Dimaadua di godou God gaa dagi goodou gi hai mee gi tenua dela ga hoohoo ga ulu ginai goodou no lodo, gei Mee ga hagabagi gi daha nia madawaawa e logo i godou mua, aanei la nia madawaawa Hittite, Girgashite, Amor, Canaan, Perizzite, Hivite mo Jebus. Nia madawaawa e hidu aanei koia e maaloo i goodou.7.1 Nnegau 13.19
